header.title: Item Insight AI
uploader.browse: or click to browse (PNG, JPG, WEBP)
uploader.instructions: Upload an image of your game item. The AI will analyze its stats, effects, and provide usage tips. For best results, use clear, well-lit screenshots.

error.analysisFailedDefault: Failed to analyze item. Please try again.
itemDisplay.identificationIssueMessage: The AI had trouble fully identifying the item or its properties.
itemDisplay.tryClearerImage: This might be due to image quality or an unfamiliar item. Please try a clearer image or a different item.
footer.demoDisclaimer: Item analysis is AI-generated and may not always be accurate. Please use as reference only.
gemini.error.apiKeyMissingUser: Gemini API Key is not configured. Please contact the administrator.
gemini.error.parsingErrorUser: Could not understand the AI's response. The raw response might contain more details.
gemini.error.apiErrorUser: An unknown error occurred while communicating with the AI. Please check your network connection and API key.
gemini.error.noRawText: Raw text could not be retrieved from AI response for language {lang}.
gemini.optionAnalysisParsingError: The AI's response was not in the expected format.
gemini.usageGuideApiError: Failed to get analysis from AI: {errorMessage}
gemini.analysisNotAvailable: Analysis not available due to configuration error.
gemini.analysisNotAvailableOnError: Analysis not available due to a prior error.
pages.about.title: About Item Insight AI
pages.about.serviceDesc1: Item Insight AI is a game item analysis tool utilizing cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology. It is a free service that helps gamers understand complex item information quickly and easily.
pages.about.serviceDesc2: Simply by uploading an item, AI analyzes the item's stats, options, and rarity, and provides usage guides and value assessments.
pages.about.feature.aiAnalysisDesc: Extract and analyze information from item images using advanced OCR and machine learning technology.
pages.about.feature.valueAssessmentDesc: Evaluate the relative value of items based on option combinations and rarity.
pages.about.feature.usageGuideDesc: Provide detailed suggestions for optimal item usage and utilization methods.
pages.about.feature.multiLanguageDesc: Support Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, French, Spanish, and Arabic for gamers worldwide.
pages.about.supportedGamesDesc: Currently supports item analysis for the following popular games:
pages.about.supportedGamesNote: * Supported games are continuously being added.
pages.about.advantage.freeDesc: Available to anyone for free without registration
pages.about.advantage.fastDesc: Accurate analysis results in seconds with the latest AI technology
pages.about.advantage.accurateDesc: High accuracy guaranteed through game-specific databases and AI learning
pages.about.advantage.privacyDesc: Uploaded images are immediately deleted after analysis
pages.about.getStartedDesc: Discover the true value of game items and experience smarter gameplay.
pages.contact.title: Contact
pages.contact.languages: Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, French, Spanish, Arabic
pages.contact.faq2.q: Q. The analysis results are inaccurate
pages.contact.faq2.a: A. Please try again with a clearer screenshot.
pages.contact.faq3.q: Q. Request for new game support
pages.contact.faq3.a: A. Please request through the contact form.
pages.contact.form.name: Name *
pages.contact.form.subject: Inquiry Type *
pages.contact.form.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your inquiry in detail
pages.contact.form.successMessage: Your inquiry has been received. We will respond as soon as possible.
pages.contact.noteText: Inquiries are usually answered within 1-2 business days. For urgent matters, please contact us directly via email.
pages.guide.title: User Guide
pages.guide.step1.title: Prepare Item Screenshot
pages.guide.step1.desc: Capture a screenshot of the item tooltip you want to analyze in the game.
pages.guide.step2.title: Upload Image
pages.guide.step2.desc: Upload the image by dragging and dropping or clicking on the homepage.
pages.guide.step3.title: Check Analysis Results
pages.guide.step3.desc: Review the item information, value assessment, and usage guide analyzed by AI.
pages.guide.proTipDesc: Set the UI scale larger in game settings and take screenshots at high resolution for more accurate analysis results.
pages.guide.diablo.tip1: Hover mouse over item to display tooltip
pages.guide.diablo.tip2: Hold Ctrl key while taking screenshot (hides comparison items)
pages.guide.diablo.tip3: Recommended to shoot in inventory or shop
pages.guide.poe.tip1: Press Alt key to show all item information
pages.guide.poe.tip2: Check detailed information in advanced mode
pages.guide.poe.tip4: Include item level and base stats
pages.guide.lostark.tip1: Right-click item to open detailed information
pages.guide.lostark.tip4: Check equipment grade and enhancement values
pages.guide.other.tip1: Use item link or detailed view
pages.guide.other.tip3: For set items, also capture set effects
pages.guide.overview.title: Item Overview
pages.guide.overview.desc: Provides basic information such as game name, item type, rarity, and level requirements.
pages.guide.attributes.title: Attribute Analysis
pages.guide.attributes.desc: Analyzes and provides detailed information about the item's base stats and additional options.
pages.guide.valueAssessment.title: Value Assessment
pages.guide.valueAssessment.desc: Evaluates the relative value of items based on option combinations and values, rated from S to F grade.
pages.guide.usageGuide.title: Usage Guide
pages.guide.usageGuide.desc: Provides specific recommendations on which builds or situations to use the item in.
pages.guide.analysisFails.tip1: Try again with higher image resolution
pages.guide.analysisFails.tip2: Ensure item tooltip is fully visible
pages.guide.analysisFails.tip3: Make sure no other UI elements overlap
pages.guide.analysisFails.tip4: Use supported file formats (PNG, JPG, WEBP)
pages.guide.inaccurateResults.tip2: Set UI scale larger in game
pages.guide.uploadFails.tip1: Check if file size is under 10MB
pages.guide.needHelpDesc: If you have problems not resolved by this guide, please contact us anytime.
pages.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pages.faq.items.1.question: Is Item Insight AI free?
pages.faq.items.1.answer: Yes, it's completely free. No registration required and runs on ads only.
pages.faq.items.2.question: Which games are supported?
pages.faq.items.2.answer: We support major MMORPGs including Diablo IV, Path of Exile, Lost Ark, World of Warcraft, Final Fantasy XIV. The list of supported games is continuously expanding.
pages.faq.items.3.question: Is my personal information safe?
pages.faq.items.3.answer: Uploaded images are deleted immediately after analysis, and we don't collect any personal information. Please check our privacy policy for details.
pages.faq.items.4.question: What image formats are supported?
pages.faq.items.4.answer: PNG, JPG, WEBP formats are supported, with a maximum file size of 10MB.
pages.faq.items.5.question: Why does analysis fail?
pages.faq.items.5.answer: This usually happens when image resolution is low, item tooltip is not fully visible, or overlapping with other UI elements. Try again with a clearer screenshot.
pages.faq.items.6.question: How to take optimal screenshots?
pages.faq.items.6.answer: Capture at high resolution (minimum 1920x1080) with item tooltip fully visible, shot on bright background clearly. Check the user guide page for detailed game-specific guides.
pages.faq.items.7.question: Analysis results are inaccurate
pages.faq.items.7.answer: AI analysis results are for reference and may not be 100% accurate. For more accurate results, try again with clearer images or adjust in-game UI settings.
pages.faq.items.8.question: Which browser should I use?
pages.faq.items.8.answer: Latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge are recommended. Some features may be limited on older browsers.
pages.faq.items.9.question: Can I use it on mobile?
pages.faq.items.9.answer: Yes, it works on mobile browsers. However, we recommend using high-resolution screenshots taken on PC.
pages.faq.items.10.question: Do you support multiple languages?
pages.faq.items.10.answer: We support Korean, English, Japanese, and Chinese. You can change the language from the language selector in the top right.
pages.faq.items.11.question: Can I request support for new games?
pages.faq.items.11.answer: Yes, please request new game support through the contact page. We'll prioritize games with high user demand.
pages.faq.items.12.question: Can I save analysis results?
pages.faq.items.12.answer: Currently we don't provide a save feature. Please take screenshots or copy the results to save them. We plan to add save functionality with account features in the future.
pages.faq.needHelpTitle: Didn't find the answer you were looking for?
pages.faq.needHelpDesc: If you still have questions, please contact us anytime. We'll provide accurate answers as soon as possible.
pages.faq.quickTips.1: If analysis fails: Try again with clearer high-resolution screenshots
pages.faq.quickTips.2: If results are strange: Increase game UI scale and re-capture
pages.faq.quickTips.3: If upload fails: Check file size and refresh browser
pages.faq.quickTips.4: If it's slow: Try using a different browser
